name: Hentai Jigsaw Puzzle: Nudity Patch
detailed_description: This is a nudity patch for Hentai Jigsaw Puzzle. You can play with the uncensored nude girls once you have this patch.
about_the_game: This is a nudity patch for Hentai Jigsaw Puzzle. You can play with the uncensored nude girls once you have this patch.
short_description: Unlocks the nudity mode for levels!
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese*, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or higher
  • Storage: 125 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes: This product includes adult only nudity content.
